name: A nice day for garbage. (Amongst other things)
name_original: A nice day for garbage. (Amongst other things)
description:
This game was made in an hour and a half for both the "trash (bitsy jam)" and "MythicJam 2" game Jams.

you are some guy, in some place, doing something.

W,A,S,D to move and interact.

This was also my first time using the "Bitsy" game engine.
